title: Awesome List Updates on Oct 03, 2024
_seo_title: Awesome List Updates on Oct 03, 2024 - Track Awesome List

items.title: Awesome Microservices
items.content_text:
### PHP / Scala

*   [Ecotone](https://docs.ecotone.tech/) - Framework based on architectural principles of DDD, CQRS and Event Sourcing that provides building blocks to create scalable and extensible applications.

### Articles & Papers / Scala

*   [Microservices - From Design to Deployment](https://www.f5.com/content/dam/f5/corp/global/pdf/ebooks/Microservices_Designing_Deploying.pdf) :small\_orange\_diamond:<sup>PDF</sup> - F5's seven-part series on microservices.
items.content_html:
PHP / Scala

  • Ecotone - Framework based on architectural principles of DDD, CQRS and Event Sourcing that provides building blocks to create scalable and extensible applications.

Articles & Papers / Scala

  • Microservices - From Design to Deployment üî∏PDF - F5's seven-part series on microservices.

items.title: Awesome Mongodb
items.content_text:
### Libraries / PHP

*   [laravel-mongodb (‚≠ê7.1k)](https://github.com/mongodb/laravel-mongodb) - Official Eloquent model and query builder for Laravel
*   [Doctrine MongoDB ODM (‚≠ê1.1k)](https://github.com/doctrine/mongodb-odm) and [MongoDB ODM Bundle for Symfony (‚≠ê384)](https://github.com/doctrine/DoctrineMongoDBBundle) - Fully featured ORM with Symfony integration
*   [MongoDB Bundle (‚≠ê37)](https://github.com/facile-it/mongodb-bundle) - Integration of the official library with Symfony, without ORM
*   [yii-mongodb (‚≠ê330)](https://github.com/yiisoft/yii2-mongodb) - Yii 2 MongoDB extension
*   [opentelemetry php auto-mongodb (‚≠ê2)](https://github.com/opentelemetry-php/contrib-auto-mongodb) - Automatic monitoring of MongoDB commands with OpenTelemetry
*   [mongo-php-adapter (‚≠ê467)](https://github.com/alcaeus/mongo-php-adapter) - Adapter for applications using `ext-mongo`
items.content_html:
Libraries / PHP

  • laravel-mongodb (‚≠ê7.1k) - Official Eloquent model and query builder for Laravel
  • Doctrine MongoDB ODM (‚≠ê1.1k) and MongoDB ODM Bundle for Symfony (‚≠ê384) - Fully featured ORM with Symfony integration
  • MongoDB Bundle (‚≠ê37) - Integration of the official library with Symfony, without ORM
  • yii-mongodb (‚≠ê330) - Yii 2 MongoDB extension
  • opentelemetry php auto-mongodb (‚≠ê2) - Automatic monitoring of MongoDB commands with OpenTelemetry
  • mongo-php-adapter (‚≠ê467) - Adapter for applications using ext-mongo

items.title: Awesome Spark
items.content_text: ### Packages / Language Bindings * [spark-connect-rs (‚≠ê109)](https://github.com/sjrusso8/spark-connect-rs) - Rust bindings. * [spark-connect-go (‚≠ê222)](https://github.com/apache/spark-connect-go) - Golang bindings.
items.content_html:
Packages / Language Bindings

  • spark-connect-rs (‚≠ê109) - Rust bindings.
  • spark-connect-go (‚≠ê222) - Golang bindings.

items.title: Awesome Emails
items.content_text:
### Services / Misc

*   [Resend](https://resend.com/) - Build, test, and send transactional emails at scale.
*   [Heybounce](https://www.heybounce.io) - Email verification service that checks if an email exists and detects disposable emails.

### Inspirations / Misc

*   [Email Copy](http://www.goodemailcopy.com/) - Email copy from great companies.
*   [TidyMails](http://tidymails.com/) - The Email Newsletters' Universe.
*   [The Top Email Campaigns](https://www.campaignmonitor.com/best-email-marketing-campaigns/) - The most effective email marketing campaigns from Campaign Monitor.
items.content_html:
Services / Misc

  • Resend - Build, test, and send transactional emails at scale.
  • Heybounce - Email verification service that checks if an email exists and detects disposable emails.

Inspirations / Misc

  • Email Copy - Email copy from great companies.
  • TidyMails - The Email Newsletters' Universe.
  • The Top Email Campaigns - The most effective email marketing campaigns from Campaign Monitor.

items.title: Awesome Developer First
items.content_text:
### Automation

*   [Lil'bots](https://www.lilbots.io/) - Create and deploy automation scripts in JavaScript or Python and deploy them to the cloud instantly, with free built-in APIs like OpenAI, Anthropic, and more.

### Mail

*   [Heybounce](https://www.heybounce.io/) - Email verification API.
items.content_html:
Automation

  • Lil'bots - Create and deploy automation scripts in JavaScript or Python and deploy them to the cloud instantly, with free built-in APIs like OpenAI, Anthropic, and more.

Mail

  • Heybounce - Email verification API.

items.title: Free for Dev
items.content_text:
### Design and UI

*   [Flyon UI](https://flyonui.com/)- The Easiest Components Library For Tailwind CSS.
items.content_html:
Design and UI

items.title: Awesome Rust
items.content_text:
### Applications / Database

*   [valentinus (‚≠ê13)](https://github.com/kn0sys/valentinus) - Next generation vector database built with LMDB bindings [![Crates.io Version](https://img.shields.io/crates/v/valentinus)](https://crates.io/crates/valentinus)

### Libraries / Network programming

*   P2P
    *   [libp2p/rust-libp2p (‚≠ê5.1k)](https://github.com/libp2p/rust-libp2p) - Implementation of libp2p networking stack. [![Circle CI](https://circleci.com/gh/libp2p/rust-libp2p.svg?style=svg)](https://app.circleci.com/pipelines/github/libp2p/rust-libp2p)
    *   [n0-computer/iroh (‚≠ê5.5k)](https://github.com/n0-computer/iroh) \[[iroh](https://crates.io/crates/iroh)] - crate for building on direct connections between devices [![CI](https://github.com/n0-computer/iroh/actions/workflows/ci.yml/badge.svg?branch=main)](https://github.com/n0-computer/iroh/actions/workflows/ci.yml)
items.content_html:
Applications / Database

  • valentinus (‚≠ê13) - Next generation vector database built with LMDB bindings

Libraries / Network programming

  • P2P
    • libp2p/rust-libp2p (‚≠ê5.1k) - Implementation of libp2p networking stack.
    • n0-computer/iroh (‚≠ê5.5k) [iroh] - crate for building on direct connections between devices

items.title: Awesome Angular
items.content_text:
